home.heroTitle: Solar Energy for Your Home & Business
home.aboutText: Influx Solar has been providing sustainable solar energy solutions since 2021. Based in Wardha, Maharashtra, we are committed to delivering high-quality solar installations for homes and businesses.

services.title: Our Services
subsidyDetails: On-grid solar panels: Clean, affordable, and efficient.
Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Company (MSEB) approved on-grid system.
Free net metering and one-night warranty.
No need to pay electricity bills, save up to 90%.
Solar panels come with a 24 to 30-year warranty.

about.title: About Us
about.mission: Our mission is to provide sustainable solar energy solutions for homes and businesses.
about.whyChooseUsText: We offer expertise, trusted brands, and a commitment to customer satisfaction.
